Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp40.view.cli

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp40.view.cli.Utils
public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
it used to be a "small" library of utilities for the CLI, now is pretty big mainly for input verification, display of tables in ascii art

    • validateIntInput

      public int validateIntInput​(int minValue, int maxValue)
      Manages the insertion of an integer on command line input, asking it again until it not a valid value.
      Parameters:
      minValue - is the minimum acceptable value of the input
      maxValue - is the maximum acceptable value of the input
      Returns:
      the value of the input

    • readDate

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a Date

    • isValidDate

      public static java.util.Date isValidDate​(java.lang.String input) throws java.text.ParseException, YoungUserException, OldUserException
      Method to parse a date from a string which throws exception if the date is not accepted
      Parameters:
      input - the string containing the date
      Returns:
      an object Date
      Throws:
      java.text.ParseException - if the format is wrong or is not a date
      YoungUserException - user too young means the birthdate inserted is after today
      OldUserException - if the date is before the one defined in Configuration

    • isValidDateBool

      public static boolean isValidDateBool​(java.lang.String input)
      method to know if a string contains a valid date
      Parameters:
      input - the string containing a date
      Returns:
      true if it's a valid date, false otherwise

    • readNotSameNumbers

      public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> readNotSameNumbers​(int min, int max, int howmany)
      method used to ask a player to insert some numbers, defined as input, and those cannot be repeated
      Parameters:
      min - value of accepted input
      max - value of accepted input
      howmany - numbers you want to read
      Returns:
      a list of the number selected by user

    • readPosition

      public int[] readPosition​(int min, int max)
      method used to read coordinates in the format xx,yy
      Parameters:
      min - value of each coordinate
      max - value of each coordinate
      Returns:
      an array of int[2] containing the coordinates

    • singleTableCool

      public void singleTableCool​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String[] inputList, int delay)
      Method used to print in asciiArt a single column table
      Parameters:
      title - of the table, will be made UPPERCASE
      inputList - an array of strings, which are the rows
      delay - millisecond between showing a line and the following

    • tableString

      public java.lang.String tableString​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String[] inputList)
      Method used to get as a string a single column table in asciiart this method doesn't print!
      Parameters:
      title - of the table, will be made UPPERCASE
      inputList - an array of strings, which are the rows
      Returns:
      a string containing the table in asciiart

      Parameters:
      title - of the form, will be displayed up
      width - of the box
      prefill - which is put inside the form
      Returns:
      the string containing the form in asciiart
